```{r}
#create matrix
#matrix with normal distn (std = 1, mean = 0, identical diagonally)
#diagonal has to be zero as youre not gonna meet yourself

#for demonstration (five of us)
set.seed(123)
live <- matrix(rep(0, 5*5), nrow = 5)
live[lower.tri(live)] <- round(rnorm(10, mean = 0, sd = 1), 0)
live <- t(live)
set.seed(123)
live[lower.tri(live)] <- round(rnorm(10, mean = 0, sd = 1), 0)
live
```

```{r}
#simulation
set.seed(123)
simGo <- matrix(rep(0,1000*1000), nrow = 1000)
simGo[lower.tri(simGo)] <- round(rnorm(450, mean = 0, sd = 1), 0)
simGo <- t(simGo)
set.seed(123)
simGo[lower.tri(simGo)] <- round(rnorm(450, mean = 0, sd = 1), 0)
simGo
```
